channel.title: Server Help
channel.description:
Hello i am starting a server using tinyscape source. i have found things i want changed on there but i don't know how to code them. like there are a couple weapons that punch instead of slash and items that wont wield. and i would like to add items i also need help with making it so the client doesn't ask for a ip on start up and making a jar file
so if you could help we would greatly appreciate it
thanks, tgeek430

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @nicke924 nicke924
item.description:
@nicke924 wrote:

Add items. Go to modelling section.
Jar file would be easy I guess follow ric’s tutorial.

Read full topic
